snippet: A Syrian extremist group linked with Al Qaeda said on Friday that it had killed a Lebanese soldier.
abstract: Al Nusra Front, Syrian extremist group with links to Al Qaeda, reports it has killed a Lebanese soldier in retaliation for Lebanese government's detention of wives and children of Islamic militants.
lead_paragraph: A Syrian extremist group linked with Al Qaeda said on Friday that it had killed a Lebanese soldier.

headline.main: Syria: Militants Say They Killed a Lebanese Soldier
headline.print_headline: Syria: Militants Say They Killed a Lebanese Soldier
